about_page.description: I am a developer focused on both the backend and frontend of applications. Currently, I work as a full-stack developer, handling all aspects of the project: frontend, backend, database, and server. I enjoy understanding the overall functionality of applications and developing them end-to-end, but my specialty is API development and server configuration.

items.description: End-to-end development of applications for internal company management
items.technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Python, Flask, ReactJS, MySQL, Heroku and Vercel.
responsibilities: Development of websites and mobile applications
Development of APIs using FastAPI and Flask
Analysis of pre-existing data to generate reports using Pandas and Numpy
Maintenance of a legacy website developed with PHP
Maintenance of a Linux server (Debian), where the applications are hosted
Use of Google services: Firebase, Drive API, Sheets API, Document AI, and Compute Engine

items.description: Development and maintenance of web applications.
items.technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Python, JQuery, Flask, ReactJS, MySQL and Heroku.
responsibilities: Maintenance of a website developed with PHP
Development of a text editor using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery
Development of a chatbot for Telegram using Python
Maintenance of an API developed with Flask

items: Start graduation studies in Computer Systems Analyst in UTP university
Learned cross-platform mobile development with React Native and Expo
Learned the development of Rest APIs with FastAPI
Learned how to deploy applications in VMs
Learned GCP APIs: Google Drive and Google Spread Sheets
Learned how to deploy production apps with Heroku and Vercel
Started a job as fullstack developer in Farmpro
Started a course of the government of my country to dig in the development of web applications
Did my first remunerated job using python: solve university exercises.
Learned the basics of HTML, CSS and JavaScript
